titles: Brittains glory: or, The history of the life and death of K. Arthur, and the adventures of the knights of the Round Table : giving a relation of their heroick exploits and victories in many lands ...  pleasant and delightful, altogether worthy the perusal of the ingenious reader.
author: Malory, Thomas, Sir, 15th cent.
J. S.
publisher: Printed by H. B. for J. Wright, J. Clark, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,
notes: Attributed by Wing to Sir Thomas Malory.
Reproduction of original in Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University.
